attributes.action: Kate Bush - Singer/Songwriter be given the highest honour available for services to Music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no other recording artist in the world today quite like Kate Bush. In the course of her twenty-seven year career, since her dramatic arrival at nineteen years of age in 1978 with the hauntingly beautiful and instantly classic 'Wuthering Heights', Bush has built a reputation that remains unrivalled in terms of musical ambition, pioneering sonics, stirring emotional content and sheer originality. She was brought pleasure to millions over many decades.
